sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ArrayPolyfill</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implementation of standard Array method find (ECMAScript 6th edition)</description>
        <name>ArrayPolyfill</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ArrayPolyfill;

if (!Array.prototype.find) {
	/**
	 * ES6
	 * Return the value of the first element in the array that satisfies the provided
	 * testing function, otherwise return undefined
	 * @see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/find
	 */
	Array.prototype.find = function(predicate) {
		if (this == null) {
			throw new TypeError('Array.prototype.find called on null or undefined');
		}
		if (typeof predicate !== 'function') {
			throw new TypeError('predicate must be a function');
		}
		var list = Object(this);
		var length = list.length >>> 0;
		var thisArg = arguments[1];
		var value;

		for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
			value = list[i];
			if (predicate.call(thisArg, value, i, list)) {
				return value;
			}
		}
		return undefined;
	};
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-03-30 17:47:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>28fafcb647c33100d06d6f2ccee49035</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ArrayPolyfill</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Core Automation" source="com.snc.core.automation">ee2289476d6620100acb70b3534330ff</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_28fafcb647c33100d06d6f2ccee49035</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>chris.nguyen</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-04-19 17:22:00</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>813</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
